content.rendered:
Directed by Gauri Shinde.

Written by Krishnan Hariharan. Kausar Munir. Gauri Shinde.

Cast Alia Bhatt(Kaira). Shah Rukh Khan(Dr. Jehangir Khan). Kunal Kapoor(Raghuvendra). Priyanka Moodley(Young Woman). Prateek Jain(Young Man). Aditya Roy Kapoor(Furniture dealer). Ali Zafar(Rumi). Bobby Duggal(Director). Angad Bedi(Sid). Darwin(Good Looking Man). Raj Bhansali(Raunaq). Sharic Sequeira(Kaitos 2nd AC). Dilip(Focus Puller). Akanksha Gade(Alka). Ira Dubey(Fatima). Richard Klein(Tom). Yashaswini Dayama(Jackie). Anubhav Nanda(Boy in Shorts – 1). Abhishek Khanna(Boy in Shorts 2). Rohit Saraf(Kiddo). Gautmik(Ganju). Keshav Uppal(Sid’s Restaurant Manager). Viral Desai(Sid Lookalike). Rohit Mehra(Lovey Dovey Boy). Shriram Iyer(Ad Film Director). Arush Nand(Ad Film Boy). Feroz Khan(Choregrapher). Nikhil Sangha(Music Video Director). Aashirwad(D.I. Colorist). Anita Lobo(Traffic Constable). Atul Kale(Kaira’s Father). Aban Bharucha Deohans(Kaira’s Mother). Yashwant Singh(Uncle). Salone Mehta(Aunt). Rosario Belmonte(Firang’s Neighbor). Ivan Rodrigues(Hotel VP). Prabhakar(Hotel Manager). Aman Bhagat(Therapist 1). Farida Patel Venkat(Therapist 2). Kishor Chandra Shrivastav(Therapist 3). Geetha Singh(Convention Woman 1 (as Geeta Singh)). Aadil Sharma(Convention Man 1). Kunal Sharma(Convention Man 2). Aarush Rana(Bicycle Kid 1). Dishita Sehgal(Kid Kaira). Brijesh Kakodkar(Campfire Friend 1). Rohit Chari(Campfire Friend 2). Anita Basarkatti(Campfire Friend 3). Nikita Anand(Family Friend). Martha Xavier Fernandes(Nani). Madhav Vaze(Nana). Rachna Fernandes(Kaira’s Young Mother). Amit Nagraj(Baby Kiddo). Rupin Suchak(Jug Lookalike). Deeksha Anand(Artsy Woman). Saranya Roy(Artsy Man). Parveen Kaur(Model for Kaira Advt. Shoot) . Paavani Atrey(LoveyDovey girl (credit only)). Ashish Bhatia(Suresh). Gulzar Dastur(Family Friend). Richard Bhakti Klein(Friend of Sid in Restaurant (as R. Bhakti Klein)). Geeta Singh(Convention woman 1). Aashay Valia(Supermarket Extra)

Language Hindi.

Producers R. Balki. Karan Johar. Pravin Khairnar. Gauri Khan. Apoorva Mehta.

Production Hope Productions. Red Chillies Entertainment.
